dungeon.ai
Interface Behaviour

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultBehaviour, HeroBehaviour
public interface Behaviour

Interface which controls mob behaviour

Derived classes are HeroBehaviour (for Hero mobs) and DefaultBehaviour (for Creature mobs)

Method Summary
 boolean deathTick(Game game)
          Bummer.
 boolean gameOverTick(Game game)
          This method is called (only for the winning team) on gameOver to give the winner a chance to update learning tables.
 boolean onTick(Game game)
          This method is called on every game tick to prompt the mob to act.
 

Method Detail

onTick

boolean onTick(Game game)
This method is called on every game tick to prompt the mob to act.

Parameters:
game - The current game object
Returns:
Returns true if the mob has acted; false otherwise.

gameOverTick

boolean gameOverTick(Game game)
This method is called (only for the winning team) on gameOver to give the winner a chance to update learning tables.

Parameters:
game - The current game object
Returns:
Returns true if the mob has acted; false otherwise.

deathTick

boolean deathTick(Game game)
Bummer. You just died:( Any final words or last thoughts?

Parameters:
game - The current game object
Returns:
Returns true if the mob has acted; false otherwise.
